params.amount: Amount of oINR to borrow (18 decimals)

buyOINR(uint256).details: User pays USDC at oracle price to get oINR, then can repay their debt

params.oinrAmount: Amount of oINR to buy (18 decimals)

returns.maxBorrowable: Maximum amount that can be borrowed

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.newOracle: Address of the new price oracle

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

buyOINR(uint256).notice: Buy oINR with USDC (for users who spent their borrowed oINR and need to buy back)

checkBorrowCapacity(address,uint256).notice: Check if a vault can borrow a specific amount

getVaultInfo(address).notice: Get vault information for a user
